sections.paragraph: + A man of Manasseh, one of the heads of the half tribe on the east of Jordan (1 Chronicles 5:24) (B.C. 720.) + A man of Benjamin, son of Has-senuah. (1 Chronicles 9:7) + A Levite, who seems to have given his name to an important family in the tribe. (Ezra 2:40) (B.C. before 536.)
